songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, ayy
Yeah, ayy, oh yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, ayy, alright
Yeah, ayy, yeah, ayy, yeah, ayy, yeah, ayy

[Verse]
Dreaming of the times where it’s dark skies and night falls
Forgive me mama but my prides off
I done died up in the stone cold cellar by myself
'Cause see the old me done died up in the midst of getting wealth
So I'm just caught up in the brick wall, dawg
I'm fallin' hard for my health
But if you had to pick me up
I hope it’s hard for you to step
And if you had to call me back
I would decline with no effect
Ain't got a hope but hold you down
'Cause see this life is such a bitch, yo, ayy
Stop going you’re moving too fast, okay, like who’s that?
Ayy, ok, ayy, ok
Stop going man, you’re moving too fast, okay, like who’s that?
Yo, yo, I've seen-
Now I've seen ashes go to ashes and this dust just go to dust
But what the fuck is always up with you?
Why you think that I can't fuck with you?
And fuck this rap shit
'Cause I ain't with the actin and you testin' off my patience
With assumptions stop actin'
Got the fuckin' weight of the world in my palms
And it's strong
I gotta take it to the top or Ima fuckin' blow it all, ayy
I'ma fuckin' blow it all, ayy
Thanks XXL, that pressure is really what I fuckin' wanted
Now my wish is fuckin' granted
Stop asking me about the old me
'Cause that nigga is fuckin' dead
Forever
songs.title: My Bullshit
